name: Date with Falco
description:
Date with Falco is a 5-10 minute authentic GB visual novel. It stars two space pilots who started dating a few months ago. Things have been rough between them in the past week, and the cold weather certainly doesn't help, but maybe a walk in the fresh snow will cheer them up.

Explore the city, walk and talk with your bird boyfriend,  get up to hijinx, and hear insight on these pilots' lives.

This is a game with no fail state. Take your time to enjoy the vibe of two pilots and their romantic bantering!

Credits

Cutscene art by Shina Kazami

Gameplay, story, music, and original pixel art by Emberlynn Bland

Emote, Urban RPG, and Font asset packs by kenney.nl

Snowland Gameboy Tileset by Dagon

GameBoy Style Home Interior Tileset by MonkeyImage

Many more asset packs and tools were used with attribution, this is included in the credits.txt file you can download for free!

Content Warnings
  • Being Gay
  • Doing Crime (Shoplifting)

The rest of this game - dialog, art, story - is general audience appropriate.

Disclaimer

If you can't hear any sound on web, download the .gb file and use one of several GB emulators to play the game instead. More info in the download instructions.

This game is unlikely to get Analogue Pocket support, I'll provide it if it's possible for GBS 2.0 projects like this one.

This game is not endorsed by nor affiliated with Nintendo. Please support official merchandise and legal access to their games. All data and assets in this game are created by people not affiliated with Nintendo. No use of Nintendo's registered trademarks can be found in this game.

Please report bugs, glitches, or other in-game strangeness in the comments below!
